forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
